ygData.subject: Re: Digest Number 70
ygData.msgSnippet: ... You re actually delirious from poison. Many people (irl) talk/sing/babble under these conditions :o) Zendarin The Wandering Minstrel
ygData.messageBody:
> > >Alright, I know most of us like it when a bug helps us, but
> > >the above really should be /bugged.
> >
> > This is a bug? Why do you say so?
>
>How do you sing or play an instrument when unconcious?
>
>If you're want to pull the "it's all in the mind" mumbo jumbo,
>why can't spellcasters cast when unconcious?

You're actually delirious from poison. Many people (irl) talk/sing/babble
under these conditions :o)

Zendarin
The Wandering Minstrel
